QuestData.Title: The Forgemaster's Log
QuestData.Description: Go to the tower the slave spoke of. You should find it on the northeastern end of the camp.$B$BIf we can act fast enough we might be able to eavesdrop on the forgemaster's meeting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Forgemaster's Log at Deathwing's Fall in Deepholm.
QuestData.RewardText: There is an entry for an upcoming meeting at the Upper Silvermarsh.$B$BThis must be where the Forgemaster is.
